body:
Comment 20 by **ma.adameit**: 
Hi,
I have the same problem on windows 7 64bit and glfw. The program opens the window but
then crashes with the following output:

panic: runtime error: call of nil func value
[signal 0xc0000005 code=0x8 addr=0x0 pc=0x0]

goroutine 1 [syscall]:

goroutine 2 [syscall]:
created by runtime.main
	C:/Go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:220
exit status 2
[Finished in 11.6s with exit code 1]


This uses glfw3 from git://glfw.git.sourceforge.net/gitroot/glfw/glfw because 2.x does
not work correctly for win64.

I attached the glfw3 libs and the needed header for your convenience along with my
sourcecode. 

The status of this bug report is WaitingForReply although the author replied with the
requested information. Is there any more info you need on this?

Greetings,
Manuel
Attachments: 1. glfw3libs.zip (75589 bytes) 1. simple.go (1507 bytes)
